name: Sudoku Master
description:
Sudoku Master packs 150 challenging puzzles to solve. Puzzles designed by Nikoli, the Sudoku experts.
SUDOKU MASTER offers 150 unique puzzles that beginners and experts alike will enjoy! A handful of tutorials will help you learn the rules and controls as you go, and handy features like Write Mode and Temp Numbers make Sudoku pleasantly user-friendly. Feeling confident? Then try your hand at Title Mode to work your way up from Rookie to Sudoku Master! All puzzles were created by Sudoku veteran NIKOLI Co., Ltd. with solving tips from the Godfather of Sudoku himself, Maki Kaji, offered between games.

This game cannot be transferred from the Nintendo DSi to the Nintendo 3DS system. For more information, CLICK HERE >
